name: RE:COIL
description:
Welcome to the most electrifying movement in coil alignment. The power has gone down and only you can help. Send some of the remaining power you have through the grid to rotate the Tesla coils and get the circuit back in shape. Just try not to run out of power as you go.

Made in 48hrs for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 39 for the theme "Running Out Of Power" for the compo (one person, no pre-made assets)

Using Unity, Blender, Paint.net, MSpaint, Bosca Ceoil, BFXR & Audacity 

please rate kindly :)
